results.content: Gives a good segway into getting the groundwork for ES6 Javascript, which can be pretty quirky! I enjoyed taking this course and learnt a ton of stuff!
results.content_html: Gives a good segway into getting the groundwork for ES6 Javascript, which can be pretty quirky! I enjoyed taking this course and learnt a ton of stuff!

results.content: Very detailed and easy to understand, although the order of some sections seemed like it could be better.
results.content_html: Very detailed and easy to understand, although the order of some sections seemed like it could be better.

results.content:
The way Stephen builds up context, bringing in the concepts and writing code immediately for explanation on what was written means and then showing their practical use cases, makes for a great pedagogical method, which is rare seen in other instructors lectures.
This course practically leaves no stone unturned on ES6 new features, and I absolutely recommend it.

results.content: Well-structured exercises that are pretty challenging and force you to think about the problem and its solution.
results.content_html: Well-structured exercises that are pretty challenging and force you to think about the problem and its solution.

results.content: This course was definitely a good match for me - especially since I am not completely new to this, but still a novice programmer with a new big break into a job, and now I have a lot of gaps to fill I was not initially aware of. This course was really helpful for me since it also did not attempt to teach me things that were completely above my head. It was just right. Thanks Stephen!

This course was really helpful for me since it also did not attempt to teach me things that were completely above my head. It was just right. Thanks Stephen!

results.content: The course was great, it helped to fill gaps in my knowledge of ES6's features and syntax. I look forward to learning more from Stephen in the future.
results.content_html: The course was great, it helped to fill gaps in my knowledge of ES6's features and syntax. I look forward to learning more from Stephen in the future.

results.content: Stephen has extensive knowledge of the material covered in this course and is able to convey it in a very straightforward way that even a newbie like me could follow easily.  Great job!!

results.content: It's a great experience learning from this course. The topics are very clear. Thank you!!!!!!

results.content: Stephen Grider is an excellent teacher! I appreciate that he breaks down the often quite abstract concepts (I'm a coding newbie) into comprehensible chunks and code snippets.  The exercises were well-chosen and manageable; it would have been nice to have additional videos explaining possible solutions, though. Thanks to the fellow coders here for chipping in with solutions and / or explanations.
results.content_html: Stephen Grider is an excellent teacher! I appreciate that he breaks down the often quite abstract concepts (I'm a coding newbie) into comprehensible chunks and code snippets. The exercises were well-chosen and manageable; it would have been nice to have additional videos explaining possible solutions, though. Thanks to the fellow coders here for chipping in with solutions and / or explanations.

results.content: Great course, excellent explanation! I would like to highlight small exercises at the end of each lecture which you have to solve on your own. I also like the stories which are told by instructor to explain lectures.
results.content_html: Great course, excellent explanation! I would like to highlight small exercises at the end of each lecture which you have to solve on your own. I also like the stories which are told by instructor to explain lectures.

results.content: I have given 4 rating to this course because I found lot's of examples which I can relate and implement in real life but I thing their is some things we need some notes at the end of the course for having more expertise in generator and other topics
